snippet: The priests planned their assaults and often abused the same children repeatedly for years, according to a report, based on victim accounts and released by the Roman Catholic Church in Germany.
abstract: Report about child sexual abuse in Roman Catholic Church in Germany, based on victim accounts, shows that priests carefully planned their assaults and frequently abused same children repeatedly for years; church says report contained information from 1,824 people, of whom 1,165 described themselves as victims; Germany’s bishops have vowed thorough and impartial investigation into abuse.
lead_paragraph: The priests planned their assaults and often abused the same children repeatedly for years, according to a report, based on victim accounts and released by the Roman Catholic Church in Germany.

headline.seo: Report Details Sexual Abuse of Children by German Priests
headline.main: German Priests Carried Out Sexual Abuse for Years
headline.print_headline: German Priests Carried Out Sexual Abuse For Years
